================================================================================
                    AIRFLOW NEWS PIPELINE - QUICK REFERENCE
================================================================================

LOCATION:
---------
/Users/davemelillo/Desktop/data_eng_ai/ch08/airflow_project/

FASTEST START:
--------------
cd /Users/davemelillo/Desktop/data_eng_ai/ch08/airflow_project
./quickstart.sh

WEB UI:
-------
http://localhost:8080
Username: airflow
Password: airflow

PIPELINE OVERVIEW:
------------------
Extract (NewsAPI) → Transform (OpenAI) → Enrich (AI) → Load (PostgreSQL) → Verify

PARAMETERS:
-----------
{
  "query": "Tesla",
  "from_date": "2025-10-05",
  "to_date": "2025-10-08"
}

COMMON COMMANDS:
----------------
Start:    docker-compose up -d
Stop:     docker-compose down
Logs:     docker-compose logs -f airflow-scheduler
Restart:  docker-compose restart
Status:   docker-compose ps

DOCUMENTATION:
--------------
1. START_HERE.txt          ← Read this first
2. GETTING_STARTED.md      ← 5-minute setup
3. SETUP_GUIDE.md          ← Complete guide
4. README.md               ← Project overview

TROUBLESHOOTING:
----------------
DAG not showing?     → Wait 30s, check logs
Import errors?       → Reinstall: pip install openai psycopg pandas pydantic
Can't connect to DB? → Use host.docker.internal in .env
Services restart?    → Check Docker RAM (need 4GB+)

PREREQUISITES:
--------------
✓ Docker Desktop running
✓ PostgreSQL (news_db)
✓ NewsAPI key
✓ OpenAI API key

FILES YOU NEED TO EDIT:
-----------------------
.env  ← Copy from env.template and add your API keys

================================================================================
